meanings.sent1: The children were left unmonitored at the playground.
meanings.sent2: The unmonitored experiment led to unexpected results.
meanings.sent3: The unmonitored puppy caused chaos in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her unmonitored emotions spilled out uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The unmonitored garden grew wild and untamed.

meanings.definition: Not kept under observation or surveillance
meanings.sent1: The unmonitored area of the forest was full of surprises.
meanings.sent2: The unmonitored security camera failed to capture the thief.
meanings.sent3: The unmonitored cookie jar mysteriously emptied itself.
meanings.sent4: Her unmonitored thoughts wandered freely in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The unmonitored river flowed undisturbed through the valley.
